name: Capybara Murder Mystery
description:
Follow our young yet determined Detective Capybara and his old childhood friend Tom B.D. Lizard as they navigate through mysterious deaths across Big Turtle City, in the middle of the holidays no less!

Enjoy playing our WIP!

START to play, SPACEBAR to advance the text.

Credits

Writer - Eoin Donaher

Programmer - Aine Holland

Artists - Asher Bozman

Nadia Wakabayashi

Juho Choi

Music - Sophia Stone

Fish Image - FreePik by ededchechine
